resources.string:
Thanks for using this application!
 A little help:
 The minimum temperature for which there is data -30 C, maximum +200
 
 Minimum resistance for thermometers 100x graduations: 87.12
 Maximum resistance for thermometers 100x graduations: 185.583
 Minimum resistance for thermometers 50x graduations: 43.56
 Maximum resistance for thermometers 50x graduations: 92.7915
 
 If you enter numbers above the maximum or below the minimum data values, an error message will appear, or if near, the maximum and minimum temperatures are shown, respectively
 All data is taken from the calibration tables used in my company and when calibrating thermometers.
 
 Do not forget to rate the app in the Play Market, if you like it!
